raw_text: REV. SR. VINCENT PERRER PERERA called to Eternal Rest. Funeral Mass on Thursday 31st August 2023 at 3.30 p.m. Burial at General Cemetery,​ Jawatta.054529

PANABOKKE – Dr. C.R. – It is with great sadness that we announce the demise of Vidya Jyothi Deshamanya Dr. C.R. Panabokke,​ Former Director of Agriculture and Former Chancellor of the University of Sabaragamuwa,​ beloved husband of late Seemanthani,​ loving father of late Aruni and Renuka and Himadri. His remains will lie at his residence No. 439/​8,​ Sudharshana Mawatha,​ Nawala on Wednesday the 30th of August 2023 and at “The Restpect” Parlour on Thursday the 31st of August 2023. The Cremation will take place on Thursday the 31st of August 2023 at 5.00 p.m. at the General Cemetery,​ Borella.054273

SALGADO – RAMYA LAKSHMINI nee JAYASEKERA – Dearly beloved wife of late M. Piyadasa Salgado (Retired Surveyor General),​ loving mother of Bimalka,​ Mouli & Chayanika,​ mother-in-law of Rohitha Seneviratne,​ Palitha Hendahewa & Sanjeewa Padumadasa,​ grandmother of Senali,​ Kulanaka,​ Virunaka,​ Sandith,​ Devmi & Archana,​ daughter of late Charles & late Sisira Jayasekera,​ sister of Kanthi Katepearachchi,​ passed away peacefully. Remains lie at 43/​20,​ Fieldview Gardens,​ Rajamaha Vihara Road,​ Nawinna,​ Maharagama. Cremation on Thursday 31st of August at General Cemetery Kanatte (New Crematorium) at 4.30 p.m.054518
